greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Greatest common divisor of the n-th and (n+1)st 3-smooth numbers.
comment: A186712 shows where this function and the 3-smooth numbers A003586 are in the same range: a(A186712(n)) = A003586(n) and a(m) != A003586(n) for m < A186712(n).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: A186711 := proc(n) igcd(A003586(n),A003586(n+1)) ; end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 28 2011
mathematica: S3 = Select[Range[3*10^4], FactorInteger[#][[-1, 1]] <= 3&]; Table[GCD[ S3[[n]], S3[[n+1]] ], {n, 1, Length[S3]-1}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 02 2018 *)
program: a186711_list = zipWith gcd a003586_list $ tail a003586_list
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 26 2011
